column4: How do I restart my network services?  sudo service network(ing) restart and sudo /init.d/network(ing) restart don't seem to be doing it.
I believe it should be sudo /etc/init.d/etc.
I guess etc. is a bad shortener there, "sudo /etc/init.d/network(ing) restart"
yes.. /etc is needed.. network and networking still not doing anything.
